title.value: Обогрев теплиц для выращивания рассады инфракрасными газовыми теплоизлучателями
Heating of greenhouses for sprout growing with the help of infrared gas thermal radiator
Heating of greenhouses for sprout growing with the help of infrared gas thermal radiator

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Demenok, N.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The problem of growing of the seedling material in the areas of risk agronomy (the conditions of the republic of Belarus) appears a serious challenge of agriculture. Sprout growing of plants is necessary for receiving of early harvest in open ground. Classical systems of greenhouse heating are noted with high energy consumption and heat losses. The most important way of energy consumption decline appears application of optimal heating system with detailed parameters of its working. The analysis of the existing systems of heating of greenhouses has been conducted in the article. The system of heating upon the base of infrared gas heat emitter providing economical and useful heating has been proposed. Economic efficiency of application of infrared heat emitters, influencing directly the plant and avoiding energy waste is evaluated.
